frontmatter.title: ReInherit: A journey through Museum Management

node.excerpt: We are excited to announce our new game project “ReInherit: A journey through Museum Management” (working title). An upcoming educational computer game, aiming to teach people about how museums function, and learn about local antiquities, in a fun and entertaining way.  Players will be able to build and run their own museums, featuring real-life…
